snippet.title: Trailer - At Eve's Wake
snippet.description:
At Eve’s Wake is an interactive horror story inspired by Lovecraft's work about a lost relative reuniting with their family and surviving their onslaught. Charm your opponents, outwit or outright murder them, those are just a few of the tools to evade your final fate — or embrace it. Your actions will shape your future and that of the family.

Play the demo now through Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1395120/At_Eves_Wake/
